Text.val: 16.11.2104 GB SCR19332 Step 2: Extended range of selection LGCC with LGCC_OMITONMONTHLYINVOICE <> Y
16.05.2014 SH SCR18906 Part 2 Removed range LDGR_INCOMETYPE between 1 and 4 from DSQL to get calc
of insurance income working (2. DSQL) if no LGCC exists where LDGR_INCOMETYPE between 1 and 4
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
14.01.2011 GB SCR16122 Extended calculation in the Steps 2, 3, 4
12.04.2007 SH SCR12436 Added pi.Type and set v.Date = GSET_DATE(248) in case of pi.Type = '2'
09.11.2006 SH SCR12071 I extended the calc of other income with LDGR_INCOMETYPE = 4, so now 3 or 4
21.06.2005 EE SCR#8510 Usage of GNRL changed to read only/no cache:
09.03.2005 WJ SCR7904 add step 4 update total client 99999
06.09.2004 JJ SCR6966 changed end task condition step 3 to No
02.08.2004 JJ SCR6651 cont. Storage to CMON with opposite sign (-)
30.07.2004 JJ SCR6651 cont. Fixed formating input params SQL
-- If pi.Type = 2 then CMON of the previous month has to be selected
... else if pi.Date = 0, update v.Date with GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, LDGR_INCOMETYPE, cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/LDGR where LGCC_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO = LDGR_ADMNO and LGCC_LDGR_NO = LDGR_NO and LGCC_OMITONMONTHLYINVOICE <> 'Y' group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, LDGR_INCOMETYPE order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO, LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, LDGR_INCOMETYPE for fetch only

select cast (sum (LGCC_AMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)), cast(sum (LGCC_AMOUNTH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/LGCC, :1/ADML where LGCC_DATE between ':2' and ':3' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO = :4 and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO = :5 and LGCC_LDGR_NO = ADML_LEDGERNO and ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 87 and ADML_ADMN_NO = LGCC_LGCD_ADMNO and LGCC_OMITONMONTHLYINVOICE <> 'Y' for fetch only

select cast(sum(cmon_totcommissionincome) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(cmon_totinterestincome) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(cmon_tototherincome) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(cmon_totiinsurancecomm) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/cmon where cmon_admno = :2 and cmon_currency = ':3' and cmon_year = :4 and cmon_month = :5 and cmon_clntno <> 99999 for read only
